author: Zoe Tidman, Zoe Tidman
title: Coronavirus: Residents in Italian town 'demand removal of woman with virus'
description: The woman reportedly arrived from Lombardy, the epicentre of Italy's outbreak
content:
Residents in a town in southern Italy took to the streets to demand a woman with coronavirus be moved out the area after the mayor spoke about her case, according to local media.
Locals in Acerra, near Naples, reportedly went to the neighbourhood in which sh… [+1859 chars]
